Name: Enrico Pallazzo
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into carbonator. CARBONATE and pour into chilled glass.
Review: A bittersweet Manhattan -style lightly sparkling cocktail.
History: Named after the fictional acclaimed Italian opera singer that Leslie Nielsen's Lt. Frank Drebin impersonates at the start of a baseball game in The Naked Gun film. Later in the movie, Drebin goes undercover on the pitch as the game's umpire. When he unmasks himself, a spectator shouts, "Hey, it's Enrico Pallazzo!" The crowd then jubilantly chant Pallazzo's name.
Nutrition: One serving of Enrico Pallazzo contains 223 calories
